args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Hazard Switch Back Lighting May Fail/FMVSS 101

Volvo Trucks North America (Volvo Trucks) is recalling certain 2023-2026 New VN trucks.  The hazard switch back lighting may become inoperative.  As such, these vehicles fail to comply with the requirements of Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS) number 101, "Controls and Displays."A hazard switch that is not illuminated may be difficult to locate when needed, increasing the risk of a crash or injury.

Number of Units Affected: 5257.0"
